 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חֲשַׁח‎</span>] **verb** ==need== (Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***—ašâ—u***</u></abbr>, ***crave***; Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***in need of***; not [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]; — 

**Pe\`al** ***Participle*** plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חָֽשְׁחִין‎</span> [[Dan.3.16|Dan 3:16]], singular Infinitive ([[BDB#van d.H.|van d. H.]], wrongly, <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חַשׁ‎</span>). 



 [<span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חַשְׁחָה‎</span>] **noun feminine** ==thing needed== (Syriac <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">; [[BDB#Nö|Nö]] in [[BDB#Kau|K]]<sup>p. 175</sup>); — plural <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎חַשְׁחָן‎</span> [[Ezra.6.9|Ezra 6:9]].
